alert.note: Alert for Walla Walla (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 14 at 4:14AM PDT until further notice by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...High water flow on small streams and creeks continue this morning with some showing signs of beginning to recede. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Oregon and southeast Washington, including the following counties, in northeast Oregon, Umatilla. In southeast Washington, Walla Walla. * WHEN...Until 400 PM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 408 AM PDT, Minor flooding has been occurring along some small streams. - Some additional showers will be possible through this afternoon. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
